A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The reviews that are like "you'll hate it you're a REAL fan" are crap. Don't put your stuff on me\, folks. I'm a real fan and I thought it was great.

It's definitely different than previous Star Wars movies. It's darker\, twist-ier\, and much more happens. I'm going to have to go see it again just to catch all of the stuff that I'm sure I missed the first time (rather than just seeing it again because of the reason I usually do\, which is that I see every movie at least a few times to make sure they get enough of my money to keep making Star Wars movies).

I like that the characters were more complex than "Luke is good and Anakin   is bad" stuff. To me\, Kylo Ren is a more nuanced character than Anakin ever was... in either trilogy. I liked that the story took unexpected turns. I liked the call-outs to fans. I liked the humour. I love Rey\, Finn\, Leia\, and now Rose. I liked the storyline with Poe and Vice Admiral Holdo. I liked that Snoke was not what anybody expected. I liked what they did with Luke\, and thought they whole treatment was very fitting and believable.

I want my Star Wars story to grow\, and this did it for me in the way that none of the other movies have. 

If you are a Star Wars fan LIKE ME\, you'll like it.
